messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed clown level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failu*3mga;b4;'1vï¿½-BZZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Brig Control.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">The AI has asked people to maximise suit sensors loads of times now, this is the only news update so far</font>

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Wires across the station fixed saving us from apower failure</font>

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Emergency maint access removed as power is fixed</font>

messages.author: Gragnir Grolob (Curator)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">I am going SSD which means no more news. Sorry crew</font>
